name: World Conference on Mechanical Engineering
content: The World Conference on Mechanical Engineering is coming to the marvelous city of Berlin, Germany on 09-11 December 2022\. There are many reasons to attend this conference. The learning opportunities are unparalleled. The scientific committee of the event ensures that every research paper presented at the event meets its high standards for quality, relevance, and authenticity. Furthermore, this academic conference is full of networking opportunities. Whether you are a researcher looking for funding for your next project, an academic interested in better understanding upcoming trends, or a graduate student interested in mentorship programs, the Mechanical Engineering conference 2022 is the place you want to be.
